work.name: UC San Diego, Department of Economics
highlights: Thesis on the Economic Impact of Smart Parking Program on San Francisco
Evaluate the impact of Smart Parking meters on the growth rate in the number of businesses and other economic measures in San Francisco using the DiD and Event Study method.
Construct extensive micro-data through ArcGIS to statistically analyze the dynamic effects with variations based on block group density and meter distribution.

work.name: UC San Diego, Department of Economics
work.summary: Supervisor: Dr. Carlos Goes, Professor Fabian Trottner, and Professor Marc Muendler
highlights: Apply STATA to compile data and create charts/tables to illustrate changes in production and employment of U.K. industries after foreign shocks.
Perform data cleaning, organize the data, and statistically analyze the distribution of foreign subsidy rates.
Attend weekly meetings to discuss, present results, and identify patterns and relationships from the descriptive statistics data.

work.name: UC San Diego, Department of Economics
highlights: Support students during and after class sessions (in-person and online) using Discord, Piazza, and Gmail.
Grade assignments, quizzes, and exams and provide constructive feedback to students.
Hold biweekly discussion sessions and office hours to review and work on problem sets.

work.name: Becamex Tokyu Co., Ltd
highlights: Utilize Excel to arrange information about competitors and PowerPoint to present the construction progress of competitors using bar graphs and charts.
Research reports on current economic conditions, sales strategies, real estate market, and urban development to improve marketing strategies.
Explore the potential customers for the show unit Japan Home.

work.name: UC San Diego, Dining Restaurant
highlights: Work in a team of 50 people.
Provide customer dining service to students and faculty.

education.studyType: B.Sc in Joint Mathematics and Economics

education.institution: London School of Economics and Political Science

awards.title: UCSD Provost's Honor
